info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 10 at 5:57PM MST until August 10 at 7:15PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHWESTERN MOHAVE COUNTY... At 557 PM MST, Doppler radar showed that the thunderstorm near Bullhead City had dissipated. However, very heavy rain had fallen uphill from the town, and water may still be flowing downhill toward the river. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Bullhead City, especially areas along and east of Arizona Highway 95. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
